session.goal: Transform DashboardPage into tabbed Command Center with domain-grouped widgets

changes_summary: Rewrote DashboardPage as a tabbed Command Center with 4 domain tabs (Overview, Business, Life, Finances), each showing a filtered subset of widgets
decisions_made: Changed page title from 'Dashboard' to 'Command Center'
Added 4 tabs with icons: Overview (BarChart3), Business (Briefcase), Life (Heart), Finances (Wallet)
Created TAB_WIDGET_MAP to define which widgets appear in each tab
Overview tab: morning-brief, daily-agenda, signal-feed, pomodoro, one-percent-tracker (+ DailyProgressHeader)
Business tab: task-dashboard, projects-list, project-stages, staffing-kpi
Life tab: habit-tracker, journal-history, wheel-of-life, vision-board, category-manager
DailyProgressHeader now only shows on Overview tab (cleaner separation)
Added filterWidgets prop to DashboardGrid to filter displayed widgets based on active tab
Filter logic respects both hiddenWidgets (user customization) and filterWidgets (tab filtering)
Used existing PageTabs component with persisted tab state via tabConfigStore
All existing functionality preserved: Jarvis AI, urgent signals banner, Customize button, New Project button, RPM Wizard, CustomizationSidebar
TypeScript compilation verified successfully with no errors

continuation.next_immediate_step: Test the tabbed Command Center in browser to verify widget filtering and tab persistence
next_three_steps: Verify each tab shows only its designated widgets
Verify CustomizationSidebar still works correctly with tab-filtered widgets
